list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long narrow sled used for the sport of coasting downhill over snow or ice. It typically is made of a lightweight board that is curved upward and backward at the front.
slide downhill over snow on a toboggan.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: my kids love to go tobogganing in the park before Christmas dinner
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Những đứa trẻ của tôi thích đi đến Bookganing trong công viên trước bữa tối Giáng sinh
